014c97d9-47ac-434c-a130-c8f67f972af7.description: Completion of the week-long hands-on workshop and gaining comprehensive knowledge and skills focused on Open vSwitch (OvS) and on SDN. OvS is an open-source software switch designed to be used as a virtual switch in virtualized server environments. The workshop provided a thorough understanding for administering SDN networks using Open Network Operating System (ONOS) controller, demonstrating the available applications supported by ONOS, and leveraging the application capabilities.
